TextLibrary.Text: You have been attacked by Imperial Guards who are trying to take Princess Serephine back home.
You have manage to flee from the Imperial Guards. But they will never be too far behind you.
You have failed to defeat the Imperial Guards. You flee, but they are close behind.
Imperial Guards are searching the area looking for you. You should be cautious.
You may have defeated some of the Imperial Guards, but the rest will not give up this easily. You should remain cautious.
You have been rewarded by Princess Serephine for your bravery.
You have defeated most of the Imperial Guards. You must continue to be cautious, as they will not give up so easily.
You have defeated the remaining Imperial Guards.
